item.title: 股息激增预示着中国市场的文化转变
item.description: 在中国政府的授意下，一些公司回购股票，并向等待回暖的投资者支付创纪录的股息，中国疲惫不堪的股市正在出现新的资本主义色彩。【原文：New shades of capitalism are emerging in China's tuckered out stock market as companies, at Beijing's behest, buy back their shares and pay record dividends to investors lying in wait for a so-far evasive rebound.】

item.title: 意大利银行业争夺战中的谁主沉浮
item.description: 被救助的意大利银行业巨头锡耶纳银行（MPS）周五向 Mediobanca 提出了 133 亿欧元（139 亿美元）的全股收购要约，这是意大利银行业复杂传奇的最新意外转折。【原文：Bailed-out lender Monte dei Paschi di Siena (MPS) launched on Friday a 13.3 billion euro ($13.9 billion) all-share buyout offer for Mediobanca , in the latest surprise twist of a complex Italian banking saga.】

item.title: 解释器：-美国比特币战略储备如何运作？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四下令成立一个数字资产工作组，其任务之一是探索美国加密货币储备。【原文：President Donald Trump ordered the creation of a digital asset working group on Thursday which, among other things, would be tasked with exploring a U.S. cryptocurrency stockpile.】

item.title: 哈利-波特》出版商布鲁姆斯伯里与亚马逊达成供货协议
item.description: 哈利-波特》出版商布鲁姆斯伯里出版公司周五表示，已与亚马逊达成新的长期供货协议。【原文：Harry Potter publisher Bloomsbury Publishing said on Friday it has reached a new long-term supply agreement with Amazon .】

item.title: 美国购物者为巴宝莉带来假日促销效应
item.description: 周五，英国奢侈品牌巴宝莉（Burberry）发布报告称，受美国假日季强劲需求的帮助，该公司季度可比店面销售额下降了4%，降幅小于预期，这是该公司扭亏为盈过程中令人鼓舞的一步。【原文：British luxury brand Burberry reported a smaller than expected 4% drop in quarterly comparable store sales on Friday, helped by stronger holiday season demand in the United States, an encouraging step in the company's turnaround.】

item.title: 爱立信第四季度营收和核心利润因美国需求复苏而增长
item.description: 瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信周五公布，由于其主要的北美市场恢复增长，第四季度收入和调整后营业利润均有所增长。【原文：Swedish telecom equipment maker Ericsson reported on Friday a rise in fourth-quarter revenue and adjusted operating profit as its mainstay North American market returned to growth.】

item.title: 中国刺激计划使 2024 年消费增长提高 1 个百分点
item.description: 中国商务部副部长盛秋平周五表示，中国的消费品以旧换新刺激计划将去年的消费增长提高了 1 个百分点以上。【原文：China's stimulus scheme for consumer goods trade-ins boosted last year's consumption growth by more than 1 percentage point, Vice Commerce Minister Sheng Qiuping said on Friday, as authorities steer expansion of the plan this year.】

item.title: 关税担忧加剧，欧洲财报或令市场保持甜蜜情绪
item.description: 尽管政治和经济动荡以及对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税威胁的担忧，欧洲企业将实现连续第三个季度的利润增长，这可能有助于维持投资者对该地区新发现的热情。【原文：European companies are set to deliver a third straight quarter of profit growth, which may help to maintain newfound investor enthusiasm for the region despite political and economic turmoil and concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs threat.】

item.title: 蒙地帕斯基银行向 Mediobanca 发起 139 亿美元收购要约
item.description: 被救助的银行锡耶纳蒙蒂帕斯基银行（MPS）周五表示，将以 133 亿欧元（139 亿美元）全股价收购 Mediobanca，这是意大利银行业复杂传奇的最新意外转折。【原文：Bailed-out lender Monte dei Paschi di Siena (MPS) said on Friday it was launching a 13.3 billion euro ($13.9 billion) all-share buyout offer for Mediobanca , in the latest surprise twist of a complex Italian banking saga.】

item.title: 路透社调查显示 1 月份东京通胀率将因能源成本而回升
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，1 月份东京的消费通胀可能加速，凸显了生活成本的持续压力。【原文：Consumer inflation in Tokyo likely accelerated in January, underlining persistent pressure on living costs, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 中国主要港口在假期前遭遇拥堵，特朗普发出关税威胁
item.description: 本周，在为期八天的农历新年假期之前，在美国可能对中国商品征收关税之前，出口商们争先恐后地从全球最大的集装箱港口之一--深圳盐田港装运货物。【原文：Exporters this week jostled to load and ship cargo from Shenzhen's Yantian Port, one of the world's largest container ports, before an eight-day Lunar New Year holiday and ahead of a potential wave of U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods.】

item.title: 起亚 2024 年营业利润达 12.7 万亿韩元
item.description: 韩国汽车制造商起亚公司周五公布，2024 年第四季度营业利润为 12.67 万亿韩元（约合 88.5 亿美元），同比增长 10.2%。【原文：South Korean automaker Kia Corp on Friday posted an operating profit of 12.67 trillion won ($8.85 billion) for 2024, with its fourth quarter performance up 10.2% from the previous year.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普上任首周对华态度缓和
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 海湾航空公司竞相上市，阿提哈德航空将向投资者征询意见
item.description: 两位消息人士称，阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）和法航（flynas）正在为今年在当地股市上市做准备，这将是近二十年来海湾地区航空公司首次进行首次公开募股（IPO）。【原文：Etihad Airways and flynas are gearing up to list on local stock markets this year, marking the first IPOs by Gulf carriers in nearly two decades, with Etihad sounding out investors next week ahead of a potential sale of around a 20% stake, two sources said.】

item.title: LG Energy Solution 电动汽车需求放缓，三年来首次出现季度亏损
item.description: 韩国电池公司 LG Energy Solution（LGES）周五公布了三年来首次出现的季度亏损，并表示预计电动汽车的需求增长将在短期内放缓。【原文：South Korean battery firm LG Energy Solution (LGES) said it expected electric vehicle demand growth to slow in the near-term, as it posted on Friday a quarterly loss for the first time in three years.】

item.title: Rivian 称其他汽车制造商正在 "敲门 "了解大众合资企业的技术
item.description: 美国电动皮卡和 SUV 制造商 Rivian 与大众汽车的合资企业正在与其他汽车制造商洽谈提供软件和电气架构的事宜，Rivian 的一位高级主管周四表示。【原文：A joint venture between U.S. electric pickup and SUV maker Rivian and Volkswagen is in talks with other automakers about supplying their software and electrical architecture, a senior Rivian executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼绿色公司任命独立律师事务所审查美国起诉书
item.description: 印度阿达尼绿色公司（Adani Green）周四晚些时候表示，该公司已指定独立的律师事务所审查美国对公司创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）和阿达尼绿色公司高层管理人员的起诉，指控他们为电力合同行贿 2.65 亿美元。【原文：India's Adani Green has appointed independent law firms to review the U.S. indictment of founder Gautam Adani and top Adani Green executives of paying $265 million in bribes for power contracts, it said late on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本央行将短期利率上调至 0.5%，众望所归
item.description: 日本央行周五提高了利率，此举在外界普遍预期之中，反映出日本央行对工资将继续上涨并使通胀率持续保持在 2% 目标附近的乐观预期与日俱增。【原文：The Bank of Japan raised interest rates on Friday in a widely expected move, reflecting its growing optimism that wages will continue rising and keep inflation sustainably around its 2% target.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构撤销加密货币资产会计指南
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（SEC）周四废除了加密货币行业长期反对的会计指导意见，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统摆脱上届政府政策的早期举措，也是加密货币行业的一次胜利。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rescinded on Thursday accounting guidance long opposed by the cryptocurrency industry, an early move in President Donald Trump's pivot away from the policies of the prior administration and a win for the crypto sector.】

item.title: 特朗普有望推高原油供应，石油价格下跌
item.description: 周五，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普向欧佩克及其实际领导者沙特阿拉伯施压，要求其降低价格以推动原油增产的广泛努力一天之后，石油市场下挫。【原文：Oil markets sank on Friday, a day after U.S. President Donald Trump pressured OPEC and its de facto leader Saudi Arabia to lower prices in a broad push to drive up crude production.】

item.title: 澳大利亚企业监管机构评估 ASX CHESS 故障后的监管应对方案
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）的清算和结算软件 CHESS 上个月发生故障后，澳大利亚企业监管机构周五表示，正在评估监管对策的所有选项。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Friday it was assessing all options for a regulatory response, after bourse operator ASX's clearing and settlement software CHESS broke down last month.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：星际之门人工智能项目将专门服务于 OpenAI
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，OpenAI、软银和甲骨文在美国开发人工智能数据中心的合资企业 Stargate 将专门为 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 服务。【原文：Stargate, the joint venture by OpenAI, SoftBank and Oracle to develop data centers for artificial intelligence in the U.S., will exclusively serve ChatGPT maker OpenAI, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 日元在日本央行决议前保持警惕；美元将出现周跌幅
item.description: 周五，在日本央行（BOJ）做出几乎肯定会加息的政策决定之前，日元成为货币市场的焦点，而美元则将迎来两个月来最糟糕的一周。【原文：The yen was front and centre for currency markets on Friday ahead of a Bank of Japan (BOJ) policy decision where it is all but certain to raise interest rates, while the dollar was headed for its worst week in two months.】

item.title: 特斯拉宣布在美国推出改良版 Model Y，售价 59,990 美元
item.description: 特斯拉周四在美国推出了改良版的 Model Y 汽车，起售价为 59,990 美元。【原文：Tesla launched a revamped version of its Model Y car in the United States on Thursday, with a starting price of $59,990.】

item.title: PMI 显示日本工厂活动降至 10 个月来最低水平
item.description: 周五进行的初步商业调查显示，尽管服务业在 1 月份进一步增强，但由于需求低迷，日本工厂活动下滑至 10 个月以来的最低水平。【原文：Japan's factory activity slumped to the lowest level in 10 months on sluggish demand though the service sector strengthened further in January, preliminary business surveys showed on Friday.】

item.title: Venture Global LNG 在美国 IPO 定价后融资 17.5 亿美元
item.description: 美国第二大液化天然气出口商 Venture Global LNG 周四表示，其美国首次公开募股定价后已募集 17.5 亿美元。【原文：Venture Global LNG has raised $1.75 billion after pricing its U.S. initial public offering, the second-largest exporter of liquefied natural gas in the United States said on Thursday.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司赢得价值 110 亿美元的英国核潜艇合同
item.description: 英国周五表示，已授予罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司一份价值 90 亿英镑（110 亿美元）的合同，为其潜艇舰队提供动力的核反应堆的设计、制造和支持服务。【原文：Britain said on Friday it had awarded Rolls-Royce a 9 billion pound ($11 billion) contract to design, make and provide support services to nuclear reactors that power its fleet of submarines.】

item.title: Meta 寻求紧急解决人工智能聊天机器人混淆美国总统姓名的问题
item.description: 一位熟悉该问题的人士说，Meta 的人工智能聊天机器人无法识别美国现任总统的问题本周被 Facebook 的所有者提升到紧急状态，需要快速解决。【原文：The inability of Meta's AI chatbot to identify the current president of the United States was elevated to urgent status by the Facebook owner this week, requiring a fast fix, a person familiar with the issue said.】

item.title: 日本核心通胀加速，12 月创 16 个月新高
item.description: 周五公布的数据显示，日本12月份核心消费者物价同比上涨3.0%，创下16个月来最快的年增长率，使市场对日本央行将继续提高超低利率的预期持续升温。【原文：Japan's core consumer prices rose 3.0% in December from a year earlier to mark the fastest annual pace in 16 months, data showed on Friday, keeping alive market expectations that the central bank will keep raising ultra-low interest rates.】

item.title: Blackstone 斥资 10 亿美元收购弗吉尼亚州数据中心附近的发电厂
item.description: 该资产管理公司周四告诉路透社，Blackstone 旗下专门从事能源行业投资的部门已同意收购 Potomac Energy Center，这笔交易象征着数据中心附近发电厂对投资者的诱惑力。【原文：The unit of Blackstone dedicated to investments in the energy industry has agreed to acquire Potomac Energy Center, the asset manager told Reuters on Thursday, in a deal symbolizing the allure to investors of power plants sited near data centers.】
